metadata.title: PM concerned over earthquake news in Turkiye, offers all possible assistance

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Apr 23 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Wednesday expressed his deep concerns over the news of an earthquake occured in Turkiye. The prime minister wrote on his official X wall, "Deeply concerned by the news of an earthquake in Turkiye. Praying for the safety of our Turkish brothers and sisters." PM Shehbaz Sharif said Pakistan stood ready to offer all possible assistance to help in this natural calamity.
